name: Shopping Sul
description: A popular shopping center with various stores, a food court, and a movie theater.
address: BR 040 - GLEBA F – PARQUE ESPLANADA III, Valparaíso de Goiás

name: Ecological Park of Valparaíso de Goiás
description: A green space for nature lovers and outdoor activities, with a lake, trails, and playgrounds.
address: Av. Planalto Central, Valparaíso de Goiás - GO

name: Brasil Center Shopping
description: Another commercial hub with numerous stores, a food court, and services.
address: Av. Marginal – Parque Esplanada III, Valparaíso de Goiás - GO

name: Saint Francis of Assisi Parish
description: A local parish that is a point of interest for those interested in religious architecture and community history.
address: Praça da Matriz, Qd. 07, Etapa A, Valparaizo I, CEP 72870-000, Valparaíso de Goiás – Goiás

name: Saia Velha Waterfall
description: A natural retreat for those looking to escape the city and enjoy a waterfall.
address: Rodovia DF-495 Km 6, Área Rural, Cidade Ocidental-GO

name: Pesque-Pague Bola Cheia
description: A fishing spot that provides a relaxed and family-friendly atmosphere.
address: Not specifically available online, but located in the Valparaíso de Goiás area.

name: Arts and Sports Center of Valparaíso de Goiás (CEU)
description: A public space that promotes culture and sports, offering various workshops and events.
address: Qd. 15, Área Especial A, Etapa C, Valparaizo I, Valparaíso de Goiás

name: Cora Coralina Municipal Library
description: A cultural hub with a large collection of books, a computer lab, and a study area.
address: Edifício Torre Center, Quadra 03, Lote 02, Valparaizo II, Valparaíso de Goiás

name: CTG Querência do Valparaíso
description: A Gaucho Traditions Center that hosts regional events and parties, providing a glimpse into the culture.
address: Avenida Senador Tancredo Neves, Valparaizo I, Valparaíso de Goiás

name: Main Avenue and Gastronomy
description: The city's main avenue is a central point for shopping, walking, and enjoying a variety of local restaurants and diners.
address: Not a specific location, but refers to the main street in the city.
